column1: # Optimized for dual OTA and larger storage with PSRAM support
# Rationale: ESP32S3 has 8MB flash (2x ESP32C3) + 16MB PSRAM
# features like OTA updates and dual boot capability with generous space allocation.
# - Dual OTA partitions for safe firmware updates
# - Firmware rollback capability on update failure
# OTA Data: 8KB for OTA metadata and boot selection
# SPIFFS: 3MB for web interface + expansion space
